name: What Remains of Ashes
description:
The enemy is 10 kilometers from the city. Time is limited. As the central supply officer for the hastily assembled defense forces, you are the final obstacle standing in the way of the enemy tidal wave. Allocate your resources as best you can to delay the invasion and allow the civilians time to escape. Glory to the Nation.

CREDITS
